description.en: Apple Music is a music and video streaming service developed by Apple Inc. Users select music to stream to their device on-demand, or they can listen to existing, curated playlists. The service also includes the Internet radio station Beats 1, which broadcasts live to over 100 countries 24 hours a day.
description.zh_TW: Apple Music是蘋果公司推出的一款線上音樂串流媒體服務。
description.zh_CN: Apple Music是苹果推出的流行音乐界又一位新成员。
description.ga_IE: Is seirbhís sruthú ceoil agus físe é Apple Music a d’fhorbair Apple Inc. Roghnaíonn úsáideoirí ceol le sruthú chuig a bhfeiste ar éileamh, nó is féidir leo éisteacht le seinmliostaí coimeádaithe atá ann cheana. Cuimsíonn an tseirbhís an stáisiún raidió Idirlín Beats 1 freisin, a chraolann beo go breis agus 100 tír 24 uair sa lá.
